data.name: Sophonce
data.detailed_description:
Sophonce is a science fiction psychological horror first-person shooter that relies on philosophical undertones as the primary focus of the plot.

Features


  • Telekinetic and elemental abilities at your disposal
  • Reflex Mode (Slo-Mo)
  • An impressive arsenal of weapons with each having unique attributes to them. Different ammo types assigned to each weapon such as frost ammo, pyro ammo, gravity ammo, lightning ammo and antimatter ammo.
  • And....more to be disclosed in the future!

Story Plot


Teaser:

In the beginning of the year 2222, a revolutionary technological discovery proved the existence of a soul which solidified proof of a higher power . The year is now 2973. Humanity has been bred over the past four centuries by artificial means due to a highly contagious otherworldly virus which permanently altered reproductive genomes and effectively sterilizing humanity in the span of days. It was found that this artificial breeding has caused humanity to no longer contain a soul inhabiting their body. You are Matthew, a tank bred human part of the royal regime task force division. You are sent on your lonesome to investigate a distress signal from a research facility located in Poseidon, a water rich planet found in "The Black-Eye Galaxy". The Royal Protector of Mars and her team were sent days prior to investigate but communication with them has been lost.
